content: the bulky weight yarn makes this dog sweater a warm choice for your pup the pattern is easily adjustable to other dog sizes by increasing/decreasing stitches and adjusting the length of the overall garment to fit your dog **materials needed ** * three 4 oz skeins of hometown usa phoenix azalea * 10 5 circular needles 16 long * straight 10 5 needles * tapestry needle for weaving in ends
